snippet: Colorado is finding out that it’s not so easy to unleash pot on hordes of tourists seeking a mellow buzz.
abstract: Maureen Dowd Op-Ed column describes having bad experience after trying marijuana-infused candy in Colorado; contends that the state is coming to grips with darker side of unleashing a drug as potent as marijuana on tourists of all ages and tolerance levels, given that the industry is set up for people who use drug frequently; calls for sensible regulation of drug.
lead_paragraph: Colorado is finding out that it’s not so easy to unleash pot on hordes of tourists seeking a mellow buzz.
